newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: PdVSA Amuay admits problems, but under control.
newsitem.headline: PdVSA Amuay admits problems, but under control.

text.p: Technical problems with a catalytic cracker at Petroleos de Venezuela (PdVSA) 470,000 barrels per day Amuay refinery are under control and will not affect international deliveries, a refinery spokesperson said.
"There has been a problem with a plant but it's under control and international deliveries have not been affected," she said.

The spokesperson declined to comment on market rumours that the 108,000 bpd catalytic cracker had been idled for a month of repairs, adding only that "everything looks very positive" and that further details would be available shortly.
